TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Rafael Gonzales, 06-04-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Gov. Rafael Gonzales, June 4, 1825. Accepting conditions of contract to settle 300 additional families.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: Translation from Record of Empresario Contracts, 1825-1835, p. 46. General Land Office of Texas. There is a Spanish copy in Austin's Blotter, in file of August 26, 1824.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1120

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Gov. Rafael Gonzales, June 4, 1825. Accepting conditions of contract to settle 300 additional families.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Having received and duly considered the articles of contract, and terms stipulated in the foregoing official communication of his *person_mentioned*Excellency*/person_mentioned*, citizen *person_mentioned*Rafael Gonzalez, Governor of the State of Coahuila and Texas*/person_mentioned*, relative to the colonization of *person_mentioned*three hundred foreign families*/person_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*on the vacant lands remaining within the boundaries of the Colony*/location_mentioned* which I have already established in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*—I hereby accept and confirm them, binding myself to fulfil them in all their parts, under the penalty of forfeiting all the rights and priviliges indicated in the third section of these articles of agreement.*/p*
*p*In testimony whereof, I hereunto sign my name, with my own hand, in the town of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="06-04-1825">4th June, 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*To *person_mentioned*His Excellency, the Governor of the *location_mentioned*State of Coahuila and Texas*/location_mentioned*.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
